Portfolio website for Leeds based design/build agency. Highlighting project information through a dynamic navigation.

Julian Jaschke 2020

Portfolio website for Leeds based sound designer Julian Jaschke. Showcasing his work and details entirely through cursor interaction.

Todays Supply 2020

Crowd sourced online directory for Arts, Design, Culture and Technology.
A website that allows users to submit entries with time/date/location information. Once curated by admins these will be diplayed with indication when live, all reponsive to users timezone.

Design: Yinka Danmole

todays.supply

Rad Union 2019

Shopify theme built bespoke for the Leeds based shopping trolley manufacturer. Branding and design that is built to stand out from the crowd.

Design: offgrid

radunion.com

TRJFP 2019

Wordpress website built to centralise all branches of the the Nationwide Charity combatting the global food waste crisis. Additional help maintaining and improving a .NET management system for internal data.

Design: offgrid

trjfp.com
